title: nova88.io
author: nova88.io
content: Nova88 CryptoSports is a crypto-based sportsbook focused on decentralization.We offer the following:No KYC, just connect your wallet and you are good to go.No need to deposit into any centralized system. comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: welcome to the forum, I noticed that your casino does not have KYC, although I and many other people do not like KYC, international laws force people to do KYC, international laws force casinos to have a license and ask their customers for KYC customers to comply with international anti-money laundering laws, even if your intentions are good, when governments hear that your casino doesn't ask for KYC they will shut down your casino, learn all of your servers and currencies, and tell you accuse of money launderingmy advice is that you strive to be licensed and ask for KYC or else you will risk being chased by the police and you will be arrested accused of money laundering and operating an illegal casino without a license and they will confiscate all your casino coins, the governments they put very high prison sentences for money laundering crimes, in my opinion it's not worth taking that risk, and for people who use your casino they will also be running the risk of one day seeing your casino closed and all coins confiscated, I don't see it advantage of it allunfortunately the damn KYC is here to stay for many long years to come, circumventing KYC is the same as breaking laws and asking to be arrested and get many years in jail, I hope that all people think a lot about this and not be deluded into thinking that things like not having a license is a good thing or if they are not asked to do KYC then they will be safe and there will be no problem
